# Nvim-R

This plugin is developed by  
Jakson A. Aquino   <jalvesaq@gmail.com> and 
         Jose Claudio Faria <joseclaudio.faria@gmail.com>

The latest version is 0.9.17

Require either Neovim 0.5.0 or Vim 8.2.84.

New options: 

*  R_set_omnifunc
*  R_auto_omni
*  R_rmarkdown_args
*  R_objbr_auto_start
*  R_quarto_render_args
*  and R_quarto_preview_args
*  R_debug_center
*  R_term_title.
*  Delete options: R_omni_tmp_file and R_omni_size.
